startupScript

Methods for interacting with the Startup Script endpoints
https://www.vultr.com/api/#startupscript

Methods

create(parameters)

Create a startup script.
https://www.vultr.com/api/#startupscript_create
Parameters:
Name Type Description
parameters object
Properties
Name Type Attributes Default Description
name string Name of the newly created startup script.
script string Startup script contents.
type string <optional>
 'boot' 'boot' or 'pxe'. Type of startup script.
Source:
  • startup-script.js, line 41

delete(parameters)

Remove a startup script.
https://www.vultr.com/api/#startupscript_destroy
Parameters:
Name Type Description
parameters object
Properties
Name Type Description
SCRIPTID string Unique identifier for this startup script.
Source:
  • startup-script.js, line 20

list()

List all startup scripts on the current account. Scripts of type "boot" are executed by the server's operating system on the first boot. Scripts of type "pxe" are executed by iPXE when the server itself starts up.
https://www.vultr.com/api/#startupscript_startupscript_list
Source:
  • startup-script.js, line 7

update(parameters)

Update a startup script.
https://www.vultr.com/api/#startupscript_update
Parameters:
Name Type Description
parameters object
Properties
Name Type Attributes Description
SCRIPTID string ID of script to update.
name string <optional>
 New name for the startup script.
script string <optional>
 New startup script contents.
